data.name: Licotri
data.description: Small lizard found around the trees, its color is light green. It eats mostly flies and other insects.

data.name: Wako
data.description: Big-sized amphibian found around ponds. Its color is dark red. Eats insects and other small animals.

data.name: Algiz
data.description: Six-footed mammal found in forests, the male has magnificent antlers. Eats fruit and random nuts.

data.name: Rulfo
data.description: Shunned by his herd because of his red nose. His potential for good is infinite.

data.name: Dripco
data.description: Singing bird found close to the water. Its color is blue. Eats small fish and berries.

data.name: Pugsh
data.description: Four eyed blue fish with short legs found close to land. Very intelligent.

data.name: Trippy
data.description: Medium black bird with 4 wings that can be found all around the land. Loves to eat anything that doesn't move.

data.name: Pheesh
data.description: Long aggressive fish. Its color is white. Can be found in small lakes.

data.name: Tortux
data.description: Huge shelled reptile. Its color is gray. Loves to eat fresh cut wood.

data.name: Clamatopi
data.description: Small roedent. Its color is gray. Loves to eat wood fences, keep it away.

data.name: Mumba
data.description: Medium sized mammal. Its color is brown. Loves eating small mammals and unatended food.

data.name: Cheak
data.description: Flightless bird found on plains areas. Its color is pink. Feeds on small seeds and it is said that eating its eggs will recover some health. Fattens fast

data.name: Roon'Cha
data.description: Oversized but friendly marsupial. Its color is blue. Very friendly.

data.name: Meki
data.description: Cave cow-like mammal that lives inside caves. Its color is blue. Feeds on mold created by water dripping inside caves.

data.name: Probiki
data.description: Small mammal with sharp teeth, very shy to strangers. Its color is brown.

data.name: Foxforo
data.description: Luminous salamander found in caves. Its color is fluorescent blue. Can be used to light the way a bit (before it escapes).

data.name: Sucubi
data.description: A goat-like mammal that lives around mountains. Its color is red. Feeds of flowers and small plants.

data.name: Lebuni
data.description: Fast raptor-like reptile, very aggressive and dangerous. Its color is dark grey. Only hunts at night, Sucubi is its favourite dish.

data.name: Zuck
data.description: Funny looking bird with flat beak. Its color is black and grey. It feeds of insects and some plants.

data.name: Veielevet
data.description: Huge sea mammal, very pleasant to the eye. Its color is light blue. It feeds of small crustacean and algae.

data.name: Hibax
data.description: Small six legged crustacean with pincers. Its color is red. It's very skittish and can escape very fast.

data.name: Lavila
data.description: Small amphibian that loves to jump and eat nolands. Its color is green. Its great in controlling insect pests.

data.name: Can'Xi
data.description: Medium sized canine, very friendly. Its color is random. It will eat what you leave behind.

data.name: Pieton
data.description: Violet two-headed legless carnivore, very hard to see since it can change color. Its bite is poisonous and can make you puke for a couple of days.
